mapper.sql: SELECT oi.id "id", oi.order_id "order_id", oi.cocktail_id "cocktail_id", oi.quantity "quantity", oi.price "price", o.regdate AS "order.regdate", o.id AS "order.id", o.user_id AS "order.user_id", m.id "menu.id", m.name "menu.name", -- 칵테일 이름 추가 m.img_url "menu.imgUrl" -- 칵테일 이미지 추가 FROM ctt_order_item oi LEFT JOIN dbduck.ctt_menu m ON oi.cocktail_id = m.id JOIN ctt_order o ON oi.order_id = o.id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ctt_order_item(order_id, cocktail_id, quantity, price) VALUES(#{order_id}, #{cocktail_id}, #{quantity}, #{price})
mapper.select: SELECT FLOOR((YEAR(CURRENT_DATE) - YEAR(u.birth_date)) / 10) * 10 AS ageGroup, SUM(oi.quantity) AS totalQuantity, m.name AS menuName, m.img_url AS menuImage FROM ctt_order_item oi JOIN ctt_order o ON oi.order_id = o.id JOIN ctt_user u ON o.user_id = u.id JOIN ctt_menu m ON oi.cocktail_id = m.id WHERE u.birth_date IS NOT NULL GROUP BY ageGroup, m.name, m.img_url ORDER BY ageGroup;
